name: Staff and Weaponry
description: Master traditional Shaolin weapons, including the staff and swords.

cards.title: Basic Staff Spin
cards.description: A foundational movement for controlling the Shaolin staff with speed and accuracy.
bulletpoints: Keep a loose but firm grip for maximum rotation speed
Use wrist movement to generate momentum
cards.summaryText: Spin the staff with relaxed control, quick hand switches, and wrist-driven momentum.

cards.title: Broadsword Slash
cards.description: A powerful, sweeping attack using the Shaolin broadsword.
bulletpoints: Lead with the edge of the sword for cutting efficiency
Maintain a fluid transition between strikes
Use body rotation to generate additional power
cards.summaryText: Let the broadsword edge flow through sweeping cuts powered by whole-body rotation.
